nodes.message: This little time warp gives the player some more time...

nodes.text: It's glowing! This must be the Wraith's Phylactery!
Okay, here I go!
Whoa, that was close. It didn't even leave a trace of the Null Runestone! Glad I set that up in advance. It probably saved my life.
Ugh!
Ouch!! That really hurt! Good thing I was wearing the Necramulet... I could've died.
Argh!!
I guess attacking magical artifacts can be dangerous.

nodes.message: It's after Day 34; Kyro is already dead, and can't be rescued.

nodes.text: I'd better get back and make sure that Joel is still alive now. If not, at least I will have avenged his death.
It's no good. My weapons don't seem to even scratch it. It's going to take a powerful magical weapon to destroy that phylactery.

nodes.name: Destroying the Phylactery
nodes.description: My dagger won't even scratch the phylactery. I need to find a magical weapon to break it.

nodes.text: Placing this runestone should help protect me from whatever it is Zac has cooked up for me. Or so I can hope.
Then again... maybe I should hold on to this.
There's a terrifying Wraith in there! It could just pop out and eat my face at any time! I can't risk carrying that thing around.
I mean, it should be obvious with the radianting energy and all, but that is some powerfully dark energy I'm feeling.
It looks like a really dull canopic jar. Could this really be the Phylactery for the Wraith?
Then again, why is it get colder the nearer I get to it? It's very scary.
It wouldn't do me any good to destroy it now, the Wraith hasn't been defeated yet! He'd probably just make a new one somewhere else.
Nope, nope, nope. I'm not touching that thing. It's got to be cursed.
Even though the Wraith isn't occupying the vessel right now, I can still feel dark energy eminating from it.
It is designed to trap souls, and it would be happy to trap mine, too.
It's just an ugly looking jar that makes this entire area feel like a giant scary icicle.
Nothing too unusual about that.
Wait - what am I talking about? I don't know, but I don't want to hang around here to find out. I should get away from here.
I don't know why - but I don't want to have anything to do with that canopic jar.
